alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 11:41AM PST until February 23 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County. * WHEN...Until 1 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest snow amounts will occur at 250 feet in elevation or higher.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County
